tool_description: Sends automated notifications to vendors, procurement staff, and stakeholders about qualification status changes, requirements, and deadlines.

urgency.description: Notification urgency level: low, normal, high, critical

error_messages: Invalid notification type: Provide a valid notification type from the system catalog.
Invalid email addresses: One or more recipient email addresses are not valid.
Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist when required for context.
Delivery failure: Unable to send notifications to one or more recipients.
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [low, normal, high, critical].
usage: Specify notification_type and recipients array. Optionally provide registration_id for context and set urgency level. The tool sends notifications and tracks delivery status.

notification_id.description: Unique identifier for tracking this notification batch
